import React from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; export const Button = ({url, target, alt, text}) => {text} //target: https://www.w3schools.com/tags/att_a_target.asp export const LinkButton = ({to, alt, text}) => {text} export const IconButton = ({icon, url, target, alt, text}) =>
{`${text}`}
